attributes.action: Make Alastair Woolley the next England football manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alastair Woolley is a fantastic armchair football manager. If his advice had been listened to in the pub over the last few years, England would have won the world cup four times and the European Championship twice.

England expects, and Alastair Woolley would like the chance to take his skills out of the living room and onto the pitch. After all, what have we got to lose?

Thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
